scripts.dev:build: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run start && docker exec -ti -w /frontend -u application myanili_app npm i && docker exec -ti -w /frontend -u application myanili_app npm run dev
scripts.shell: npm run start && docker exec -ti -w /frontend -u application myanili_app bash
scripts.shell:root: npm run start && docker exec -ti -w /frontend -u root myanili_app bash
scripts.postinstall: npm run start && docker exec -w /frontend -u application myanili_app npm i && docker exec -w /app -u application myanili_app composer update
